name: Kijk Goed!
overview: Look closely! The program teaches children to observe very closely and trains the memory. It contains two games, some parts of which can be played by more people. The first game (on the A side of the cassette) takes place around farmer Jansen farm and consists of three parts. Images of the animals in the yard appear on the screen, the position, shape and color of which the player has a good idea of must record. The second game (on the B-side of the cassette) is an astronaut selection test. In the beginning, the player is prepared for this. From a series of images from the world of space travel he remembers and indicates the correct position, among other things. In the last part, the test itself can be taken. In both programs, each part can be played at different levels. Developed for children aged seven to twelve.
